siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: To see notification logs of calls, follow steps below. You will see up to 10 last logs for the past 14 days. If there are no logs, then notifications were not fired recently. You can click “Test” and it will fire a notification action in the same manner it would in an event.
markdownRemark.html:
To see notification logs of calls, follow steps below. You will see up to 10 last logs for the past 14 days. If there are no logs, then notifications were not fired recently. You can click “Test” and it will fire a notification action in the same manner it would in an event.

  1. Open the main menu on the top left [menu icon]
  2. Select Dashboard
  3. In the servers list find the server you want to edit and click Open next to it
  4. On the top right click Settings
  5. Make sure Notifications are expanded
  6. Expand the notification to view details
  7. Under all notification settings there are a couple buttons, one of them is “Show logs” click on it.

frontmatter.title: How to see notification logs of API calls?
How to turn off all notifications?
